author: ctarricone
body:
#### PR description:

This PR aims at updating Btl local reco validation, adding monitor elements for cluster local Y resolution used to test the scenario D95 for the release CMSSW_13_0_0_pre4. Checks are separately done for global Z < 0 and Z > 0.   

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, runs, and it has been used for the validation of the aforementioned campaign.
title: MTD Validation: Update Btl Local Reco Monitoring
